item.description:
May's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Put in a good word for me.

For writers, words are the most basic tools in our tool box. You can seek out sesquipedalian words, like the ones described in this article, or just subscribe to wordbuilding lists like A.Word.A.Day or Word of the Day. Whatever you do, you need the right words to explain what you're writing about.

Challenge: Bring a cool word or two.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: Words. We may even play some word games.

5:00 Break
Open Discussion

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers May Meeting
